definition: local currency/our own currency/abbr. for 本位貨幣|本位货币
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: The return to a national currency would also involve renegotiating business contracts, both within Greece and between Greeks and others.
sentences.chinese: 改用本幣還會牽涉到重新協定國內和涉外商務合同。
